text: @realDonaldTrump Fully agreed too bad Oregon's Gov @OregonGovBrown did not attend your call.  She is weak and doesn't know how to Govern a state. Where was the National Guard in Portland. It's bad enough that we loose lives due to Covid-19 and now this?  I just wish the POTUS had the authority.
